TopicTitle: Help can't get to the Mun

Articles.Content: Ive tried litery 100 times to get to the mun and verytime i either miss or crash on the mun ive watched countless tutorials on it and they all just don't work for me I need HELP!

Hi there, sorry that you're having problems. Are your problems in the design of your craft or the execution of the mission? Would help if you post a pic of the craft you are using and some pics from in map mode showing what your transfer attempts look like.

If watching tutorials hasn't worked out for you, perhaps a written tutorial might work out better? My friend Vanamonde has made a (stock) craft specifically for training new pilots to get to and return from Mun. As well as the craft there is a very detailed written tutorial (with pics) explaining how to fly the craft and navigate it to Mun, land and return home again. Might be worth you checking that out, at least you can know that you have a craft that will work so you can just focus on the piloting aspects.

Here's the tutorial with the craft download

It would be helpful if you could be more specific as to what aspect of getting to the Mun you are have problems with - getting an intercept, establishing an orbit around the Mun, landing? A screenshot of your craft may also help just in case there are any design flaws that are contributing to your problems.
Beautiful, in-game image illustrated guide mentioned above. Follow that and you shouldn't have any problems :-)
